name: Hyperdimension Neptunia Re;Birth2: Sisters Generation
summary: Hyperdimension Neptunia Re;Birth 2: Sisters Generation is the remake of Hyperdimension Neptunia mk2 for the PlayStation Vita developed by Felistella, which features a new selection of playable characters. Akin to the earlier remake game for the PS Vita, Hyperdimension Neptunia Re;Birth 1, this game also utilises the battle system from Hyperdimension Neptunia Victory in addition to a "remake system" which unlocks special modifications to the game. The remake features an improved framerate compared to the performance of the original mk2 PS3 game, in addition to reworked voice acting, music and visuals.

alternative_names.name: Choji Jigen Game Neptune Re;Birth2: Sisters Generation
Chou Tsugitsugimono Game Neptune Re;Birth2: Sisters Generation
超次次元ゲイム ネプテューヌRe;Birth2 SISTERS GENERATION

esrb.synopsis: This is a role-playing game in which players lead a group of young goddesses on a quest to stop an evil organization. As players advance the storyline, they explore a fantasy environment and battle creatures (e.g., slime monsters, dragons, robots) in turn-based combat. Players use swords, lances, oversized syringes, and colorful light attacks to deplete opponents' hit points. Battles are accompanied by impact sounds and cries of pain. The game includes suggestive material in still-image sequences and dialogue: female characters licked by a robotic creature's oversized tongue; characters bathing in a hot spring—most characters are covered with towels, though some are depicted partially nude (e.g., exposed buttocks, large amounts of cleavage); characters make several suggestive comments (e.g., “I'll lick you nice and gentle, as if I were licking the suds off you”; “Lady Vert, you're...huge...I can see them bulging out even from behind you”; “Don't be hatin' just because you're not on my hit-that list!”). The words “sh*t” and “b*tch” appear in dialogue.

pegi.synopsis:
The content of this game is suitable for persons aged 12 years and over only.
It contains: Non realistic looking violence towards human characters - Sexual images and/or sexual innuendo - Mild bad language
